title: Synchronisation stalled after "no peers available or all tried for download"
body:
I saw an more than an hour long stall of syncronisation (no more chain segment imported). Restarting the node started the sync again.

```
WARN [05-04|18:11:11.600] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=50d98c3306ce31c5bc8a656c957be9665d607a41141c400a757472204a8db83b err="no peers available or all tried for download"
ERROR[05-04|18:11:11.600] Ethereum peer removal failed             peer=50d98c33 err="peer not registered"
INFO [05-04|18:12:05.868] Deep froze chain segment                 blocks=6  elapsed=190.325ms number=11607951 hash="0cce62â€¦9be3b8"
WARN [05-04|18:12:11.630] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=541c8345e169a0fee877e8d1e3b359ecdc25ad5821bd41c283b1af23827d0a97 err=timeout
ERROR[05-04|18:12:11.631] Ethereum peer removal failed             peer=541c8345 err="peer not registered"
INFO [05-04|18:12:11.631] Looking for peers                        peercount=4 tried=0  static=0
INFO [05-04|18:12:26.733] Looking for peers                        peercount=4 tried=17 static=0
INFO [05-04|18:12:41.818] Looking for peers                        peercount=4 tried=8  static=0

ERROR[05-04|18:14:46.987] Ethereum peer removal failed             peer=253e921a err="peer not registered"
INFO [05-04|18:14:52.771] Looking for peers                        peercount=4 tried=7  static=0
WARN [05-04|18:14:54.763] Synchronisation failed, retrying         err="peer is unknown or unhealthy"
INFO [05-04|18:58:53.448] Writing clean trie cache to disk         path=/home/archive/geth_data/geth/triecache threads=1
INFO [05-04|18:58:53.453] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0
INFO [05-04|19:00:57.652] Persisted the clean trie cache           path=/home/archive/geth_data/geth/triecache elapsed=2m4.201s
INFO [05-04|19:58:53.448] Writing clean trie cache to disk         path=/home/archive/geth_data/geth/triecache threads=1
INFO [05-04|19:58:53.453] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0
INFO [05-04|20:00:45.315] Persisted the clean trie cache           path=/home/archive/geth_data/geth/triecache elapsed=1m51.866s
```
(still have the full log if needed)

#### System information

Version: 1.10.2-stable
Git Commit: 97d11b0187b4695ccf44e3b71b54155fe405a36f
Git Commit Date: 20210408
Architecture: amd64
Go Version: go1.16
Operating System: linux
The same issue, but only with Ropsten. With mainnet all fine. Tried in a few instances
helped me to replace flag networkid with `--ropsten`
